data.text:
@neilbosworth @gillianoberholzer @stefanbar 

This is a known issue - It will only happen as soon as a Verifier runs out of cases.

Not supposed to ever happen on Live.

This issue was as result of the Sorter having issues over the weekend.

The user should by now have something to work on and not have this error anymore.

Please get user to confirm that she is not experiencing this anymore
